commit.message:
auto merge of #13744 : adrientetar/rust/derp, r=brson

- Serve webfonts locally
- Style changes around `blockquote` and `code`
- Minor adjustments from previous changes

Bringing back updated examples: [modified tutorial](http://adrientetar.legtux.org/cached/rust-docs/tutorial.htm) and [modified manual](http://adrientetar.legtux.org/cached/rust-docs/manual.htm).
And for rustdoc, [modified `enum.FileType`](http://adrientetar.legtux.org/cached/rust-docs/enum.FileType.htm), [modified `std`](http://adrientetar.legtux.org/cached/rust-docs/std.htm) and [modified `std::io`](http://adrientetar.legtux.org/cached/rust-docs/io.htm).

files.patch:
@@ -141,6 +141,26 @@ doc/footer.inc: $(D)/footer.inc | doc/
 	@$(call E, cp: $@)
 	$(Q)cp -a $< $@ 2> /dev/null
 
+doc/FiraSans-Regular.woff: $(D)/FiraSans-Regular.woff | doc/
+	@$(call E, cp: $@)
+	$(Q)cp -a $< $@ 2> /dev/null
+
+doc/FiraSans-Medium.woff: $(D)/FiraSans-Medium.woff | doc/
+	@$(call E, cp: $@)
+	$(Q)cp -a $< $@ 2> /dev/null
+
+doc/Heuristica-Regular.woff: $(D)/Heuristica-Regular.woff | doc/
+	@$(call E, cp: $@)
+	$(Q)cp -a $< $@ 2> /dev/null
+
+doc/Heuristica-Italic.woff: $(D)/Heuristica-Italic.woff | doc/
+	@$(call E, cp: $@)
+	$(Q)cp -a $< $@ 2> /dev/null
+
+doc/Heuristica-Bold.woff: $(D)/Heuristica-Bold.woff | doc/
+	@$(call E, cp: $@)
+	$(Q)cp -a $< $@ 2> /dev/null
+
 # The (english) documentation for each doc item.
 
 define DEF_SHOULD_BUILD_PDF_DOC

@@ -1 +1,3 @@
-<link rel="shortcut icon" href="http://www.rust-lang.org/favicon.ico" />
+<link rel="shortcut icon" href="http://www.rust-lang.org/favicon.ico">
+<link href='http://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Source+Code+Pro:400'
+        rel='stylesheet' type='text/css'>
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -38,11 +38,11 @@ r##"<!DOCTYPE html>
 
     <title>{title}</title>
 
-    <link href='http://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Source+Sans+Pro:400,600'
+    <link href='http://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Source+Code+Pro:400,600'
           rel='stylesheet' type='text/css'>
     <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="{root_path}main.css">
 
-    {favicon, select, none{} other{<link rel="shortcut icon" href="#" />}}
+    {favicon, select, none{} other{<link rel="shortcut icon" href="#">}}
 </head>
 <body>
     <!--[if lte IE 8]>
